job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Where Innovation Meets Excellence! We're transforming the banking industry with cutting-edge technology and unparalleled customer experiences. Be part of a dynamic team that's redefining the future of digital banking. Together, we'll create groundbreaking solutions and achieve incredible success. Your journey to making a real impact starts here!"
       Backbase created the Backbase Engagement Banking Platform - a unified platform with the customer at the center, helping banks orchestrate seamless journeys across every stage of the customer lifecycle.
       From customer onboarding, to customer servicing, customer loyalty and loan origination, we help financial institutions surpass customers' expectations in every phase of the customer lifecycle.
       Built from the ground up with the customer at the heart, our Engagement Banking Platform easily plugs into existing core banking systems and comes pre-integrated with the latest fintechs so financial institutions can innovate at scale.
       Industry analysts Forrester, Gartner, Celent, Omdia and IDC continuously recognize Backbase's category leadership position.
       What you'll do
       Do you have a platform mindset and you get excited from architecting and building AI driven solutions as part of a highly scalable platform? As the Lead AI Engineer, you'll be the mastermind behind a cutting-edge AI driven automation platform that streamlines operations and enhances customer experiences.
       If you're ready to take on a pivotal role in shaping the future of AI automation in banking, we want to hear from you.
       Responsibilities:
          + Design, develop AI driven platform capabilities, part of a state of the art orchestration and automation platform;
          + Design a composable software architecture for an AI platform consisting of AI agents and machine learning capabilities;
          + Leverage composable frameworks for implementing AI driven capabilities as a single service or as an agentic flow;
          + Collaborate with other experts and stakeholders to understand functional and non-functional requirements and translate them into scalable solutions;
          + Optimize deployed AI capabilities, ensuring optimal performance in high demanding environments;
          + Share knowledge in the team and across other value streams.
       Who you are, Loud and busy sometimes but always friendly, helpful, and super fun. We love to celebrate each other's achievements, share jokes, and our love for food, movies, traveling, and sports. We're one big and diverse family working towards the same goal.
       Lunch
       Free, healthy lunches every day. Plus snacks and drinks.
       Social
       Friday parties every month. Office boat you can use with your team.
       Health
       Discounted gym membership through our corporate fitness plan.
       Training budget
       Specific budget for your personal development.
       High spec equipment
       We provide all employees with high-spec Macs and tech set up.
job_details.full_text:
Lead Principal AI Engineer

Where Innovation Meets Excellence! We're transforming the banking industry with cutting-edge technology and unparalleled customer experiences. Be part of a dynamic team that's redefining the future of digital banking. Together, we'll create groundbreaking solutions and achieve incredible success. Your journey to making a real impact starts here!"
       Backbase created the Backbase Engagement Banking Platform - a unified platform with the customer at the center, helping banks orchestrate seamless journeys across every stage of the customer lifecycle.
       From customer onboarding, to customer servicing, customer loyalty and loan origination, we help financial institutions surpass customers' expectations in every phase of the customer lifecycle.
       Built from the ground up with the customer at the heart, our Engagement Banking Platform easily plugs into existing core banking systems and comes pre-integrated with the latest fintechs so financial institutions can innovate at scale.
       Industry analysts Forrester, Gartner, Celent, Omdia and IDC continuously recognize Backbase's category leadership position.
       What you'll do
       Do you have a platform mindset and you get excited from architecting and building AI driven solutions as part of a highly scalable platform? As the Lead AI Engineer, you'll be the mastermind behind a cutting-edge AI driven automation platform that streamlines operations and enhances customer experiences.
       If you're ready to take on a pivotal role in shaping the future of AI automation in banking, we want to hear from you.
       Responsibilities:
          + Design, develop AI driven platform capabilities, part of a state of the art orchestration and automation platform;
          + Design a composable software architecture for an AI platform consisting of AI agents and machine learning capabilities;
          + Leverage composable frameworks for implementing AI driven capabilities as a single service or as an agentic flow;
          + Collaborate with other experts and stakeholders to understand functional and non-functional requirements and translate them into scalable solutions;
          + Optimize deployed AI capabilities, ensuring optimal performance in high demanding environments;
          + Share knowledge in the team and across other value streams.
       Who you are, Loud and busy sometimes but always friendly, helpful, and super fun. We love to celebrate each other's achievements, share jokes, and our love for food, movies, traveling, and sports. We're one big and diverse family working towards the same goal.
       Lunch
       Free, healthy lunches every day. Plus snacks and drinks.
       Social
       Friday parties every month. Office boat you can use with your team.
       Health
       Discounted gym membership through our corporate fitness plan.
       Training budget
       Specific budget for your personal development.
       High spec equipment
       We provide all employees with high-spec Macs and tech set up.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes designing, developing, and architecting AI-driven platform capabilities, specifically mentioning AI agents, machine learning capabilities, and composable frameworks for implementing AI-driven capabilities as a single service or agentic flow. This aligns strongly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer, particularly in building and maintaining production-grade user-facing software systems and leveraging generative models and frameworks. While there's mention of machine learning capabilities, the focus on agents and platform-level AI solutions points more towards GenAI than traditional ML Engineering.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves designing and developing AI-driven platform capabilities, architecting composable software for an AI platform, and implementing AI capabilities as a service or agentic flow, which are core software development activities for integrating AI into platforms.
job_tasks.phrase: Design, develop AI driven platform capabilities

job_tasks.justification: Designing a software architecture for an AI platform, including AI agents and machine learning capabilities, is a fundamental software engineering task.
job_tasks.phrase: Design a composable software architecture for an AI platform consisting of AI agents and machine learning capabilities

job_tasks.justification: Leveraging composable frameworks to implement AI capabilities as a service or agentic flow directly relates to building and integrating software components.
job_tasks.phrase: Leverage composable frameworks for implementing AI driven capabilities as a single service or as an agentic flow

job_tasks.justification: Collaborating with stakeholders to understand functional and non-functional requirements and translating them into scalable solutions is a key aspect of aligning technical work with business needs.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with other experts and stakeholders to understand functional and non-functional requirements and translate them into scalable solutions

job_tasks.justification: Optimizing deployed AI capabilities to ensure optimal performance in high-demand environments falls under the operational aspect of managing AI systems in production.
job_tasks.phrase: Optimize deployed AI capabilities, ensuring optimal performance in high demanding environments

job_tasks.justification: Sharing knowledge within the team and across value streams is a clear indicator of communication and collaboration skills.
job_tasks.phrase: Share knowledge in the team and across other value streams

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with other experts and stakeholders
Share knowledge in the team and across other value streams
architecting and building AI driven solutions
